explanation: [0-0] A man wearing a white cap and brown clothes is on a football field. He places his left foot on the ball, performing a trapping action. Beside him is another man in a white and red football uniform guarding him, with tall buildings in the background.

[0-4] The man in brown then kicks the ball, turning his back on the defender, and finally picks up the ball and throws it away with both hands. Subsequently, the subtitle "WHERE THE BALL?" appears. The man in brown starts to tease the defender, and the subtitle "YOU SURE?" emerges. The defender follows him closely. Then, the man in brown turns around to face the defender, the subtitle changes to "LOOK BEHIND YOU," and he points his right index finger forward. Only then does the defender realize the ball is not at the feet of the man in brown, and he reacts with a gesture of his palms pressed together.
